Description.Details:
The Narc Missile Beacon launcher is designed to fire a single, highly specialized missile employing a Pod onto the target. The Improved Narc Missile Beacon was developed by Comstar and boasts improved range. Available Pods:
Homing Pod: Magnetically attaches to the target. The attached beacon transmits data to allied units, causing the linked target to receive increased accuracy from subsequent enemy attacks.
Explosive Pod: A shaped charge warhead deals damage.
Haywire Pod: Scrambles attached Mechs sensors, decreasing their accuracy.
